decision_conditions: <p>The garage conversion hereby permitted shall not be occupied or used at any time as a separate residential unit and shall remain in an incidental use to the host dwellinghouse at no.&nbsp;4 Woodhall Avenue, Pinner, Harrow, HA5 3DX. Any other material change of use would require planning permission</p><p><br></p>
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

The door in the flank elevation of the proposed development shall either be a solid material, or be of purpose-made obscure glass (or a combination of the two), and shall thereafter be retained in that form.

Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the flank elevation of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.

<p>The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><p>Location Plan, Flood Risk Assessment, Reasonable Exception Statement, 01, 02, 03, 04, 05</p><p><br data-cke-eol="1"></p>
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Conversion of garage into habitable room with alterations to front and side elevations
